document_data.caption: A map of the Moonsea showing the Bowshaft Way south of the great lake.
document_data.name: Bowshaft Way
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bowshaft Way''' was a large road found in the [[Moonsea]] region just south of the great lake.
document_data.Description: The roadway originated in the west, branching east from the [[North Ride]]. It passed through the ruins of [[YÃ»lash]] before reaching [[Hillsfar]] along the coast of the Moonsea.
